title: "MAST90122 Lab"

There are labs between week 2--11. 

There is no lab for Week 1. However, if you do not know R, please study *An Introduction to R* at https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/R-intro.pdf


The code is tested under R version
```{r, echo=TRUE, fig.width=6, fig.align="center", message = FALSE}
R.version.string
```
and the following packages (not a complete list)
```{r, echo=TRUE, fig.width=6, fig.align="center", message = FALSE}
packageVersion("ggplot2")
packageVersion("mapdata")
packageVersion("maps")
packageVersion("mapview")
packageVersion("plyr")
packageVersion("sf")
packageVersion("sp")
packageVersion("raster")
packageVersion("rgdal")
```
